catchphrase: Working is already hard. Handling your paperwork shouldn't be. Let us help you keeping it simple.

cv.name: Curriculum Vitae
cv.description: A simple, clean and professional CV template. Highlight your skills and experience.

resignation.name: Resignation Letter
resignation.description: A professional resignation letter template. Keep it simple and straightforward.

invoice.name: Invoice
invoice.description: A minimalist invoice template. Keep track of your sales and get paid faster.

features.title: Another template provider?
features.description: Hell yeah! But this one is different:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: Pick the document you want. Fill it. Export. Done. Don't waste time picking between a thousand options.

straightforward.title: Straightforward
straightforward.description: Pay once or pay as needed. No complicated pricing. No subscription.

direct.title: Not complicated
direct.description: You just want a template for your documents. Nothing more, nothing less. Don't be overwhelmed by features you don't need.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Only pay for what you need. No hidden fees. No complicated pricing.

sheet.title: Sheet
sheet.description: Hey you! Yes, you! The lightweight user who just needs a template to handle things fast. This is for you.

document.title: Document
document.description: Ideal for those who need to handle multiple documents, want to save time and access them anywhere.

library.title: Library
library.description: If you are a heavy lifter when it comes to paperwork, this is the plan for you.

footer.description: Paper is a minimalist template provider for documents dedicated to offering a simple, user-friendly alternative in the software market, which is often cluttered with subscription-based, feature-heavy products that can overwhelm users.

suggestions.title: Want to see a template?
suggestions.description: Send us a suggestion and we'll try our best

footer.support: Do you like the project and would you like to contribute?
